content:
It feels to me like the settings are hard to parse in dark theme right now. The selection in the left sidebar, dropdown boundaries, and the boundaries between the panels are barely visible. Could we fix this?

Screen-Shot-2023-05-16-at-12.33.34-PM.png

Before any of the design changes we made recently, the borders between panels were pretty hard to see too, but I think the rest of it was better:

Screen-Shot-2023-05-16-at-12.39.39-PM.png

I don't know if the color changes in the settings UI were intentional? @Vlad Korobov @Aman (amanagr) @Evy FYI
I think we should try to improve this for the 7.0 release.
Agreed. Happy to follow Vlad's recommendation here when it comes up.
I didnâ€™t provide any recommendations on settings UI
I have no idea why they are changed
OK, in that case it sounds like we should figure out how to revert the changes in settings.
Hm, I deliberately undid modal changes. So maybe something else crept through somehow

@Evy are you working on a PR to undo the changes to settings overlays? I'd like to get an updated version integrated ASAP so that we can have bake time to catch any possibly follow-up bugs with that change.
I can work on it tomorrow if nothing is opened by tomorrow afternoon :)
#25652 cc @Tim Abbott @Alya Abbott
I don't know if I caught everything, but there are at least a couple of places you missed (I left comments on the PR).
Thanks! Sorry about that, I'll take a more thorough look today
See #issues > drafts background in dark theme for a related issue that we still need to fix.
